item.title: Adding SSL certificate to Apache
item.description: How we have been installing SSL certificates on our Apache servers Obtain certificate using Certbot Adapted from the Certbot website Update snapd sudo snap install core; sudo snap refresh core Install Certbot app sudo snap install --classic certbot Prepare the Certbot command sudo ln -s /snap/bin/certbot /usr/bin/certbot If Apache is currently running, disable it so Certbot can use the port sudo systemctl stop apache2.
